titles.title: The Lord Your God Is In Your Midst

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord your God is in your midst,
The Lord of hosts to save.
He will exalt over you with joy.
He will renew you in His life.
He will exalt over you with shouts of joy,
With shouts of joy, with shouts of joy,
With shouts of joy, with shouts of joy!
